00022 
00023     template<typename T>
00024     class DataReaderImpl : public DDS::DataReaderListener 
00025     {
00026     public:
00027       typedef typename topic_data_reader<T>::type DR;
00028       typedef typename topic_data_seq<T>::type TSeq;
00029       
00030     public:
00031 
00032       DataReaderImpl(const dds::Topic<T>& topic) :
00033         topic_(topic),
00034         drqos_(topic_.get_qos())
00035       {
00036         sub_ = ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_subscriber();
00037         DDS::DataReader* r =
00038           sub_->create_datareader(topic_->get_dds_topic(),
00039                                   drqos_,
00040                                   0,
00041                                   0);
00042         
00043         dds::Assert::precondition(r != 0, "Unable to create DataReader",
00044                                   __FILE__);
00045         boost::shared_ptr<DR> tmp(DR::_narrow(r), mem::DRDeleter(sub_));
00046         reader_ = tmp;
00047       }
00048       
00049       DataReaderImpl(const dds::Topic<T>& topic,
00050                      const dds::DataReaderQos& qos) :
00051         topic_(topic),
00052         drqos_(qos)
00053       {
00054         sub_ = ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_subscriber();
00055         DDS::DataReader* r =
00056           sub_->create_datareader(topic_->get_dds_topic(),
00057                                   drqos_,
00058                                   0, 
00059                                   0);
00060         
00061         boost::shared_ptr<DR> tmp(DR::_narrow(r), mem::DRDeleter(sub_));
00062         reader_ = tmp;
00063       }
00064 
00065       DataReaderImpl(const ContentFilteredTopic<T>& cftopic)
00066         : topic_(cftopic.get_related_topic()),
00067           cftopic_(cftopic),
00068           drqos_(topic_.get_qos())
00069       {
00070         sub_ = ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_subscriber();
00071         DDS::DataReader* r =
00072           sub_->create_datareader(cftopic_->get_dds_topic(),
00073                                   drqos_,
00074                                   0,
00075                                   0);
00076         
00077         boost::shared_ptr<DR> tmp(DR::_narrow(r), mem::DRDeleter(sub_));
00078         reader_ = tmp;
00079       }
00080 
00081       DataReaderImpl(const dds::ContentFilteredTopic<T>& cftopic,
00082                      const dds::DataReaderQos& qos)
00083         : topic_(cftopic.get_related_topic()),
00084           cftopic_(cftopic),
00085           drqos_(qos)
00086       {
00087         sub_ = ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_subscriber();
00088         DDS::DataReader* r =
00089           sub_->create_datareader(cftopic_->get_dds_topic(),
00090                                   drqos_,
00091                                   0,
00092                                   0);
00093         
00094         boost::shared_ptr<DR> tmp(DR::_narrow(r), mem::DRDeleter(sub_));
00095         reader_ = tmp;
00096       }
00097       ~DataReaderImpl() {
00098         reader_->set_listener(0, 0);
00099       }
00100       
00101     public:
00102       
00103       void set_datareader(dds::DataReader<T>* dr) 
00104       {
00105         dds_reader_ = dr;
00106         reader_->set_listener(this, DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00107       }
00108       
00115       inline DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00116       read(TSeq& samples, 
00117            DDS::SampleInfoSeq& infos) 
00118       {
00119         return reader_->read(samples, 
00120                              infos, 
00121                              DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00122                              DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00123                              DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00124                              DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00125       }
00126       
00133       inline DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00134       take(TSeq& samples, 
00135            DDS::SampleInfoSeq& infos) 
00136       {
00137         return reader_->take(samples, 
00138                              infos, 
00139                              DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00140                              DDS::ANY_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00141                              DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00142                              DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00143       }
00144       
00149       DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00150       read(TSeq& samples, 
00151            long max_samples) 
00152       {
00153         DDS::SampleInfoSeq infos(max_samples);
00154         return reader_->read(samples, 
00155                              infos, 
00156                              max_samples,
00157                              DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00158                              DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00159                              DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00160       }

00206            long max_samples,

00209            DDS::InstanceStateMask instances_state)

00218       
00220       DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00221       return_loan(TSeq& samples, 
00222                   DDS::SampleInfoSeq& infos) 
00223       {
00224         return reader_->return_loan(samples, infos);
00225       }
00226       
00228       // -- ForwardIterator read/take
00229       template <typename DataForwardIterator, typename InfoForwardIterator> 
00230       uint32_t
00231       read(DataForwardIterator data_begin, 
00232            InfoForwardIterator info_begin,
00233            uint32_t max_samples, 
00234            DDS::SampleStateMask samples_state,
00235            DDS::ViewStateMask views_state,
00236            DDS::InstanceStateMask instances_state) {
00237         //@TODO: Static assert on iterator tag
00238         TSeq data;
00239         DDS::SampleInfoSeq info;
00240         uint32_t size;
00241         reader_->read(data, 
00242                       info, 
00243                       max_samples,
00244                       samples_state, 
00245                       views_state,
00246                       instances_state);
00247         
00248         size = data.length();
00249         for (uint32_t i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
00250           *data_begin = data[i];
00251           *info_begin = info[i];
00252           ++data_begin;
00253           ++info_begin;
00254         }
00255         return_loan(data, info);
00256         return size;
00257       }
00258       
00259       template <typename DataForwardIterator, typename InfoForwardIterator> 
00260       uint32_t
00261       read(DataForwardIterator data_begin, 
00262            InfoForwardIterator info_begin,
00263            uint32_t max_samples) {
00264         return read(data_begin, 
00265                     info_begin, 
00266                     max_samples, 
00267                     DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE,
00268                     DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00269                     DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00270       }

00274       read(DataForwardIterator data_begin, 
00275            uint32_t max_samples) {

00278         uint32_t size;
00279         reader_->read(data, 
00280                       info, 
00281                       max_samples,
00282                       DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00283                       DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00284                       DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00285         
00286         size = data.length();
00287         for (uint32_t i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
00288           *data_begin = data[i];
00289           ++data_begin;
00290         }
00291         return_loan(data, info);
00292         return size;
00293       }

00362       uint32_t
00363       read(DataOutputIterator data_begin, 
00364            InfoOutputIterator info_begin,
00365            DDS::SampleStateMask samples_state,
00366            DDS::ViewStateMask views_state,
00367            DDS::InstanceStateMask instances_state) {
00368         //@TODO: Static assert on iterator tag
00369         TSeq data;

00372         reader_->read(data, 
00373                       info, 
00374                       DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00375                       samples_state, 
00376                       views_state,
00377                       instances_state);
00378         
00379         size = data.length();
00380         for (uint32_t i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
00381           *data_begin = data[i];

00468       // -- Vector read/take
00469       void read(std::vector<T>& data, 
00470                 std::vector<DDS::SampleInfo>& info,
00471                 DDS::SampleStateMask samples_state,
00472                 DDS::ViewStateMask views_state,
00473                 DDS::InstanceStateMask instances_state) {
00474         TSeq dat;
00475         DDS::SampleInfoSeq inf;
00476         reader_->read(dat, 
00477                       inf, 
00478                       DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00479                       samples_state, 
00480                       views_state,
00481                       instances_state);
00482         
00483         for (int i = 0; i < dat.length(); ++i) {
00484           data.push_back(dat[i]);
00485           info.push_back(inf[i]);
00486         }
00487         return_loan(dat, inf);
00488       }
00489 
00490       void read(std::vector<T>& data, 
00491                 std::vector<DDS::SampleInfo>& info) {
00492         this->read(data, 
00493                    info, 
00494                    DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00495                    DDS::ANY_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00496                    DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00497                    DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);             
00498       }

00500       void read(std::vector<T>& data) {
00501         TSeq dat;
00502         DDS::SampleInfoSeq inf;
00503         reader_->read(dat, 
00504                       inf, 
00505                       DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00506                       DDS::ANY_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00507                       DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00508                       DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00509         
00510         for (uint32_t i = 0; i < dat.length(); ++i) {
00511           data.push_back(dat[i]);
00512         }
00513         return_loan(dat, inf);
00514       }

00516       void take(std::vector<T>& data, 
00517                 std::vector<DDS::SampleInfo>& info,
00518                 DDS::SampleStateMask samples_state,
00519                 DDS::ViewStateMask views_state,
00520                 DDS::InstanceStateMask instances_state) {

00524                       inf, 
00525                       DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00526                       samples_state, 
00527                       views_state,
00528                       instances_state);

00548       void take(std::vector<T>& data) {
00549         TSeq dat;
00550         DDS::SampleInfoSeq inf;
00551         reader_->take(dat, 
00552                       inf, 
00553                       DDS::LENGTH_UNLIMITED,
00554                       DDS::ANY_SAMPLE_STATE, 
00555                       DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00556                       DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00557         
00558         for (int i = 0; i < dat.length(); ++i) {
00559           data.push_back(dat[i]);
00560         }
00561         return_loan(dat, inf);
00562       }
00563       //
00565       boost::shared_ptr<DataInstanceReader<T> > 
00566       get_instance_reader(const T& key) 
00567       {
00568         boost::shared_ptr<DataInstanceReader<T> > ireader(new DataInstanceReader<T> (reader_, key));
00569         return ireader;
00570       }
00571       
00572       // -- Qos Getter/Setter
00573       
00574       dds::DataReaderQos 
00575       get_qos() const
00576       {
00577         return drqos_;
00578       }
00579       
00580       DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00581       set_qos(const dds::DataReaderQos& qos) 
00582       {
00583         DDS::ReturnCode_t rc = reader_->set_qos(qos);
00584         if (rc == DDS::RETCODE_OK)
00585           drqos_ = qos;
00586         return rc;
00587       }
00588       
00589       boost::shared_ptr<DDS::Subscriber> 
00590       get_subscriber() const {
00591         return sub_;
00592       }
00593       
00594       dds::Topic<T> 
00595       get_topic() const
00596       {
00597         return topic_;
00598       }
00599       
00600       DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00601       wait_for_historical_data(const DDS::Duration_t timeout) 
00602       {
00603         return reader_->wait_for_historical_data(timeout);
00604       }
00605       
00606       // -- Condition API
00611       template <typename F>
00612       ::dds::ReadCondition
00613       create_readcondition(const F& f, 
00614                            dds::SampleStateMask sample_state, 
00615                            dds::ViewStateMask view_state, 
00616                            dds::InstanceStateMask instance_state)
00617       {
00618         DDS::ReadCondition* rc =
00619           reader_->create_readcondition(sample_state, view_state, instance_state);
00620         
00621         ::dds::mem::RCondDeleter<DR> deleter(reader_);
00622         ::boost::shared_ptr <DDS::ReadCondition> rrc(rc, deleter);
00623         ::dds::TReadCondition < dds::DataReader<T>, F> ardc(rrc, 
00624                                                             *dds_reader_, 
00625                                                             f);
00626         return ardc;
00627       }
00628

00632                             const dds::ViewStateMask&       vsm,

00634                             const std::string&              query_expr,
00635                             const std::vector<std::string>& params)  {
00636 
00637         DDS::QueryCondition* qc = 
00638           reader_->create_querycondition(ssm,
00639                                          vsm,
00640                                          ism,
00641                                          query_expr,
00642                                          params);
00643 
00644       }
00645       */
00646     public:
00647       
00648       void on_requested_deadline_missed(DDS::DataReader*,
00649                                         const DDS::RequestedDeadlineMissedStatus& status) 
00650       {
00651         (boost::get<on_requested_deadline_missed::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_, status);
00652       }
00653       
00654       void on_requested_incompatible_qos(DDS::DataReader*,
00655                                          const DDS::RequestedIncompatibleQosStatus& status) 
00656       {
00657         (boost::get<on_requested_incompatible_qos::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_, status);
00658       }
00659       
00660       void on_sample_rejected(DDS::DataReader*,
00661                               const DDS::SampleRejectedStatus& status) 
00662       {
00663         (boost::get<on_sample_rejected::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_, status);
00664       }
00665       
00666       void on_liveliness_changed(DDS::DataReader*,
00667                                  const DDS::LivelinessChangedStatus& status) 
00668       {
00669         (boost::get<on_liveliness_changed::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_, status);
00670       }
00671       
00672       void on_data_available(DDS::DataReader*) {
00673         (boost::get<on_data_available::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_);
00674       }
00675       
00676       void on_subscription_matched(DDS::DataReader*,
00677                                    const DDS::SubscriptionMatchedStatus& status) 
00678       {
00679         (boost::get<on_subscription_matched::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_, status);
00680       }
00681       
00682       void on_sample_lost(DDS::DataReader*,
00683                           const DDS::SampleLostStatus& status) 
00684       {
00685         (boost::get<on_sample_lost::value>(signals_))(*dds_reader_, status);
00686       }
00687       
00688     public:
00689             
00690       template <typename Signal> dds::sigcon_t connect(typename Signal::template traits<T>::slot_type slot) {
00691         return boost::get<Signal::value>(signals_).connect(slot);
00692       }
00693       
00694     protected:
00695       // -- Signals
00696       boost::tuple<typename dds::on_data_available::traits<T>::signal_type,
00697                  typename dds::on_requested_incompatible_qos::traits<T>::signal_type,
00698                  typename dds::on_liveliness_changed::traits<T>::signal_type,
00699                  typename dds::on_requested_deadline_missed::traits<T>::signal_type,
00700                  typename dds::on_sample_rejected::traits<T>::signal_type,
00701                  typename dds::on_subscription_matched::traits<T>::signal_type,
00702                  typename dds::on_sample_lost::traits<T>::signal_type>
00703       signals_;
00704       
00705     protected:
00706       dds::Topic<T>                               topic_;
00707       dds::ContentFilteredTopic<T>                cftopic_;
00708       boost::shared_ptr<DDS::Subscriber>          sub_;
00709       boost::shared_ptr<DR>                       reader_;
00710       dds::DataReaderQos                          drqos_;
00711       boost::shared_ptr<DDS::DataReaderListener>  listener_;
00712       dds::DataReader<T>*                         dds_reader_;
00713     };
00714   }
